================

### Notice of Request for Proposal

**Title**
----------

Lithium Ferro Phosphate Batteries, Products, and Components

### Reference Information

**Advertisement Reference**
---------------------------

PW-SP-904-81375

**Solicitation Number**
-----------------------

**Publication Date**
------------------

2022-09-07

**Tender Closing Date**
-----------------------

2022-09-22T14:00:00
### Contract Information

**Trade Agreement**
------------------

Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Tendering Procedures**
----------------------

Open Bidding

**Selection Criteria**
--------------------

Lowest Price

**Regions**
---------

National Capital Region (NCR)

### Contract Description

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) is soliciting proposals for the supply of Lithium Ferro Phosphate batteries, battery cabinet, bus bar kits, 1000A combiner unit with DC shunt, and stranded connection. The proposal should include all necessary information regarding the supply chain, product specifications, and delivery.

**Quantity**
----------

The NRC requires various quantities of the above-mentioned products; the exact quantity will be specified in the bid.

**Delivery**
---------

All deliverables should be received by November 25, 2022, in Ottawa, Ontario.

### Additional Details

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

The documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Attachment
--------------

The Request for Proposal and other relevant documents are available on the [Canada Buys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). Responders are encouraged to review the documents carefully before submitting their proposals.

### Deadline
--------------

Proposals must be submitted by 2022-09-22T14:00:00.
